name: o-charts
description: FT style charts, axes, scales etc

scripts.test: jshint src && caddy build && karma start test/karma.unit.js --single-run && karma start test/karma.functional.js --single-run
scripts.test-regression: caddy serve & sleep 4 && npm run regression
scripts.regression: npm run clean-regression && casperjs test test/regression/
scripts.clean-regression: rm -rf test/regression/failures & rm -rf test/regression/new & rm -rf test/regression/reference/*diff.png & rm -rf test/regression/reference/*fail.png
scripts.sort-regression: mkdir -p test/regression/new && mv test/regression/reference/*diff.png test/regression/new & rm -rf test/regression/reference/*.fail.png && npm run rename-regression
scripts.rename-regression: for fname in test/regression/new/*.diff.png ; do mv "$fname" "$(echo "$fname" | sed 's/\.diff//')" ; done; for fname in test/regression/failures/*.fail.png ; do mv "$fname" "$(echo "$fname" | sed 's/\.fail//')" ; done;

author: tom pearson
